long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Acadium is an innovative tool that allows users to add homework tasks throughout the day and generate a personalized study schedule based on the Pomodoro Technique. It also includes a built-in Pomodoro timer to help you keep track of your work as you complete it.
